Articles.Content:
Ok, so I decided to get this funny little program and glad I did, throughly enjoying it. I've only had the program 1 day before v.23, so my knowledge is 0 lol.

To quote a famous line.

- - - - -

Your mission should you choose to accept is , rescue lil Jeb, but first you have to strand him in space. ! ALONE, NO FOOD, NO WATER , NO AIR. get on with it woman,. !!!!! ok, ok..

The Mission parameters.

This must be done from a NEW CAREER. ! First task

Strand Jeb in orbit about home planet WITH NO PARACHUTE , NO FUEL, and NO ROCKETS. !

Progress this new career and find a way to save Jebediah.

Heavenly.

ps, i'll be trying as I accidentally stranded him in orbit with you guessed it.

No , parachute, no fuel and no rockets. lol

this is going to a LOOOOOOOG job lol.

PPS, NO HINTS PLEASE, it's against my rules.

PPPS, This message will not self destruct.

PPPPS, I love it when a mission comes together.

PPPPPS, SHUUUUUUUUUUUT UUUUUUUUUUUP

HMMM - SIDE NOTES, no remote controlled unmanned vehicles allowed either. Must be a fully maned/woman vehicle theta Jeb can get into.

Edited December 20, 2013 by Heavenly Daughter

Jeb enjoy spacewalk. Don't border him.

And he is capable to remote control a SSTO to his side as he wish.

BTW. Thats mine version of Jeb.

Edited December 20, 2013 by Sirine

Jeb enjoy spacewalk. Don't border him.

And he is capable to remote control a SSTO to his side as he wish.

BTW. Thats mine version of Jeb.

He's cute.

But cheating is not allowed. Forbidden it is. Hmmmm

Heavwnly

He's cute.

But cheating is not allowed. Forbidden it is. Hmmmm

Heavwnly

Well, time capsule here. 6 months later came back to this thread. And you will know...rescue Jeb from orbiting "Home planet", is an easy job.

Or perhaps, you want to put up your save file here. And let the public to compete....Who is the fastest to send Jeb home...Land back to KSC (Kerbal Space Center)..
